siteMetadata.title: Jedr's Blog
siteMetadata.description: Blog by Jedr Blaszyk. Bikepacking, photography & tech.

frontmatter.title: Exploring Apache Lucene - Part 3: Running at Scale
frontmatter.spoiler: Exploring strategies to scale up Apache Lucene to serve high-traffic applications. Looking at how serverless architectures can enable cost-effective scalability.

frontmatter.title: Nrtsearch Tutorial - Indexing Web Content for Search
frontmatter.spoiler: Let's use nrtsearch search engine to support website search with custom ranking and results highlighting. I'm also building a website crawler, data indexer and Search UI to interact with the system.

frontmatter.title: Exploring Apache Lucene - Part 2: Search and Ranking
frontmatter.spoiler: Diving deep into Lucene's search and ranking - data structures, query types, concurrent searching and custom scoring.

frontmatter.title: The Tech Stack of Fast, Free, and Customizable Blog
frontmatter.spoiler: Building a blog with GatsbyJS, GraphQL, MDX and Github Pages.  Customization, open-source and performance - completely for free.

frontmatter.title: Exploring Apache Lucene - Part 1: The Index
frontmatter.spoiler: Exploring Apache Lucene's core concepts - inverted index, insertions and deletions.

frontmatter.title: Geometric Deep Learning - an overview
frontmatter.spoiler: Series of posts covering learnings from my MEng thesis "Geometric Deep Learning for Subcortical Brain Shape Analysis".
